name: Autodesk Fusion 360
notes:
The path to the exe file has a random id in it. I don't know how to set it dynamically, so it may need to be adjusted manually afterwards. (drive_c/users/$USER/Local Settings/Application Data/Autodesk/webdeploy/production/6a0c9611291d45bb9226980209917c3d/FusionLauncher.exe)

DXVK is needed to run Fusion 360 for the first time. Unfortunately the workspace is not rendered using DirectX 11.
Go to preferences, change the graphics driver to DirectX 9 and restart Fusion 360.

execute.command: sed -i '/maj, min, build = /c\    maj, min, build = winver[:3]' $CACHE/fusion_installer/platform.py; sed -i "/return uname().system/c\    return 'Windows'" $CACHE/fusion_installer/platform.py; sed -i "/return uname().release/c\    return '7'" $CACHE/fusion_installer/platform.py; sed -i "/return uname().version/c\    return '6.1.7601'" $CACHE/fusion_installer/platform.py

task.name: winetricks
task.app: vcrun2017 corefonts winhttp wininet win7 d3d11=builtin atmlib dxvk gdiplus iertutil msxml3 msxml6 urlmon vcrun2017 winhttp wininet

content:
files:
- fusion_installer:
    filename: Fusion360ClientDownloader.zip
    url: https://dl.appstreaming.autodesk.com/production/installers/Fusion%20360%20Client%20Downloader.exe
- platform_py: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/python/cpython/master/Lib/platform.py
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/users/$USER/Local Settings/Application Data/Autodesk/webdeploy/production/6a0c9611291d45bb9226980209917c3d/FusionLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    description: extract installer
    dst: $CACHE/fusion_installer/
    file: fusion_installer
- move:
    description: extract installer
    dst: $CACHE/fusion_installer/
    src: platform_py
- execute:
    command: sed -i '/maj, min, build = /c\    maj, min, build = winver[:3]' $CACHE/fusion_installer/platform.py;
      sed -i "/return uname().system/c\    return 'Windows'" $CACHE/fusion_installer/platform.py;
      sed -i "/return uname().release/c\    return '7'" $CACHE/fusion_installer/platform.py;
      sed -i "/return uname().version/c\    return '6.1.7601'" $CACHE/fusion_installer/platform.py
    description: patch installer
- task:
    app: vcrun2017 corefonts winhttp wininet win7 d3d11=builtin atmlib dxvk gdiplus
      iertutil msxml3 msxml6 urlmon vcrun2017 winhttp wininet
    description: winetricks
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: --quiet
    description: run installer
    executable: $CACHE/fusion_installer/streamer.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
  version: ge-protonified-4.10-x86_64
